claim_statement: Based on factual evidence, DHS cannot be trusted to manage appropriated funds in accordance with law.

supporting_facts.fact: Legislative audit identified duplicate payments and inadequate cash receipt procedures across DHS divisions
DHS Medicaid compliance status remains OPEN — control issues from 2021 audit not resolved
DHS required release of restricted reserves from DFA for Summer EBT program — compliance status MIXED
SABG allocation tracking shows MIXED compliance status
Federal SUBG 20% prevention requirement tracking not documented — status OPEN

pattern_summary: Of 4 field validations examining DHS compliance: 0 captured, 2 open, 2 mixed. Zero clean compliance records.
